The video was originally shared on Faceb: 2019, and has been viewed over 61,000 times.
The post: s caption explicitly mentions the location as Chembur in Mumbai and includes relevant hashtags related to the heavy rain and flooding in the city.
Journalist Abhijit Deshmukh: who is from Jalna in Maharashtra, posted the same video on Twitter on July 3, 2019, clearly stating that it is from his hometown and not from Chembur. He later posted additional videos and provided the exact location of the incident in Jalna, including a nearby school and an advertisement board for D's photo studio.
